shadow.field:
let w = VARS['w'] = window.innerWidth;
 let h = VARS['h'] = window.innerHeight;
 
if(w/h<1.78){VARS['fov'] = h/w * 31.5 + 5.378}
if(w/h<1){
 VARS['mobile'] = 1
 VARS['delta'] = 1
 
}

document.addEventListener('mousemove', (event) => {
 const screenWidth = window.innerWidth;
 const screenHeight = window.innerHeight;

 const centerX = screenWidth / 2;
 const centerY = screenHeight / 2;

 // Смещение мыши от центра
 const offsetX = centerX - event.clientX;
 const offsetY = centerY - event.clientY;

 // Нормализация в диапазон [-1, 1]
 const normalizedX = offsetX / (screenWidth / 2);
 const normalizedY = offsetY / (screenHeight / 2);

 // Ограничим значения
 const clampedX = Math.max(-1, Math.min(1, normalizedX));
 const clampedY = Math.max(-1, Math.min(1, normalizedY));

 // Вызов процедуры с двумя аргументами
 puzzles.procedures['rotate_interaction'](clampedX , clampedY);
});
